title: Ranked Border/Profile problemos
body:
So basically, 
Silver 5 in season 8
Got my border when season ended
Ranked changes, lost my border for a bit
Got it back
Lost it again in the past few days
My profile says my highest rank was bronze 2
Riot?

replies.body: What I dont understand is why release a patch when its not clear from all its bugs? Like I guess youd release it for the event. But all that hard work of getting that border and not showing would tilt people beyond belief XD

For one, the bug wasn't known until after the patch went live. Internal testing just can't compare to live testing, no matter how thorough you are, especially so when you have short patch turnovers.

For two, it's generally not wise to delay content/bring down a whole gamemode for the sake of a purely cosmetic bug that can just be fixed next patch cycle.

It's a known issue with accounts that got their highest rank bumped up to div 4 with the new changes. Should be fixed next patch, as I understand it they didn't want to bring ranked queues down for what is basically a cosmetic bug.
except it says my highest rank was Gold 1, but I know for certain I've never bothered to try getting beyond gold 3. I mean if I got that far, I'd have probably pushed for Plat.
Yours shows G5 when I look at your profile so I'm not sure on that one.
